argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mplgrp.p | |- P = ( I mPoly R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` P ) = ( Base ` P ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Grp ) -> I e. V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Grp ) -> R e. Grp ) |
| 6 | 2, 1, 3, 4, 5 | #P_mplsubg | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Grp ) -> ( Base ` P ) e. ( SubGrp ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mplval2 | |- P = ( ( I mPwSer R ) |`s ( Base ` P ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_subggrp | |- ( ( Base ` P ) e. ( SubGrp ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) -> P e. Grp ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ R e. Grp ) -> P e. Grp ) |
